Abilitydex

Voyager New Abilities
Voyager Updated Abilities
Voyager Negative Abilities
Name Score Description
Bland Skin -4 Halves the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat.
Butterfingers -2 The Pokémon may drop its held item when hit by a damaging move.
Cecity -3 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Imperious -6 This Pokémon sometimes refuses to obey its Trainer.
Inflexible -3 This Pokémon can only use the first move it uses in battle.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Predictable -4 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Weak Bones -4 Halves the Pokémon's Defense stat.
